name: Tulsi Gramodhyog Seva Samiti
briefDescription: We have 12A, 80G, and FCRA registrations. Since 1998, Tulsigramodyog Seva Samiti has been doing work for poor children's education, poor people's health,  poor women's employment, the environment, old age homes, and blind children. Recently we constructed a hospital school engineering college for poor people, and currently we are running an initiative for women empowerment that provides day boarding for the children of working mothers.
